court: IN THE HIGH COURT OF JUDICATURE AT BOMBAY ORDINARY ORIGINAL CIVIL JURISDICTION OFFICIAL LIQUIDATOR S REPORT NO.36 OF 2009 IN COMPANY PETITION NO.642 OF 1983 The Official Liquidator as the . Liquidator of M/s.Shreeniwas Cotton . Mills Limited (In liquidation) ....Petitioner Mr.Mayur Shetty i/b M.V. Kini & Co. for the State Bank of India. Mr.Shaikh Yusuf Ali i/b S.Mahomedbhai & Co. for Meghal Homes. Mr.P. Ramarao, Official Liquidator present. CORAM : S.J. VAZIFDAR, J. DATED : 26TH FEBRUARY, 2009. P.C. : 1. The report is answered in the affirmative in terms of paragraphs 10(a) and (b). The terms and conditions are the same at present.
